items.summary: Fix the camera startup flow so the live camera preview reliably starts on initial load (on supported devices/browsers) instead of staying stuck on the loading screen.

Ensure the manual user-gesture fallback to start the camera is triggered consistently when automatic startup does not complete promptly, and that the fallback action successfully starts the camera when tapped.

Improve camera error detection and user guidance so that when camera startup fails, the UI surfaces a specific, English, actionable message (e.g., HTTPS required, permission denied, no camera found, camera in use) rather than only showing a generic loading state.
